keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure quick and effective healthcare in the community, stop downgrade plan, protect local health services, see a doctor or dentist when needed, increase GP availability, out-of-hours provision of services, create more NHS dentists in areas of high demand.

Improve mobile signal, broadband, and Wi-Fi access, modernize the transport system, advancements in mobile phone, broadband, 3G and Wi-Fi, unite nation and give fast, reliable and affordable travel options, more available ways to travel, create a successful Wales.

issues.health: Plaid government will help see a doctor or dentist when needed â€“ for example increasing the availability and out-of-hours provision of GP services where needed.

images.caption: Doctor and Dentists - When you need one to ensure quick and effective healthcare in your community.
Connecting Wales - Plaid will improve mobile signal, broadband and Wi-Fi access and a modern transport system to move Wales forward.
